App.Query: Select [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.State] From WorkItems Where [System.WorkItemType] = 'User Story' AND [Iteration Path] = @CurrentIteration OR [Iteration Path] = @CurrentIteration - 1 order by [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority] asc, [System.CreatedDate] desc

Select [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.State] From WorkItems Where [System.WorkItemType] = 'User Story' AND {iterationsFilter} order by [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority] asc, [System.CreatedDate] desc
